ParaLine.String: Lord Ramsbotham to move that this House do agree with the Commons in their
Amendment 1, and do propose Amendment 1A in lieu of the words so left out
No alteration or reform may be made to the provision of probation services
unless the proposals have been laid before, and approved by resolution of,
